wikipedia_page.main: Roger Robinson, better known as Robbo Ranx, is a UK dancehall and reggae DJ. He presented shows on BBC Radio 1Xtra for twelve years.

response: | Rihanna || You Me At Six || Envy || Semtex & Robbo Ranx
* Robbo Ranx, a UK dancehall and reggae deejay
Tippatone Sound is a sound system from London, active in the 1980s. It was founded by Robbo Ranx, who was also the sound's selector and producer. The sound also recorded with General Levy.
